snippet.title: Automakers unveil China-focused models in Beijing
snippet.description: Ford Motor Co. on Sunday unveiled a new Escort sedan designed in China for global sale at a Beijing auto show that highlighted the growing influence of Chinese tastes on the industry.

snippet.title: The fracking divide: Mexico's oil frontier beckons U.S. drillers in wake of new law
snippet.description: With new energy law, Mexico beckons with the mother lode next door

snippet.title: Muscle cars out in force at New York auto show
snippet.description: Who says America has lost its muscle?

snippet.title: How Ford got a Mustang on top of the Empire State Building
Beetle marks 65th year since entry into US
snippet.description: Sixty-five years after the first Volkswagen Beetle arrived in the United States as a distinctively shaped, little car, the Beetle keeps attracting buyers with its more-spacious-than-ever, flexible interior, turbo engine power and modernized iconic look.

snippet.title: Montreal mayor looks to NYC for anti-graft advice
snippet.description: Montreal's mayor sought to convince Manhattan business leaders Tuesday that his administration is moving past the corruption scandals that brought down his two predecessors and have become the "elephant in the room" when trying to lure investment to Canada's second largest city.

snippet.title: Arlington and Alexandria volunteer opportunities
snippet.description: Goodwin House, Bikes For the World, Veterans Moving Forward and Bowen McCauley Dance need volunteers.

snippet.title: Pruett and Rojas win IMSA race at Long Beach
snippet.description: Scott Pruett and Memo Rojas teamed Saturday to win the United SportsCar Championship Series race at Long Beach.

snippet.title: US agency closes probe into Ford pickup trucks
snippet.description: U.S. safety regulators have decided against seeking a recall of Ford F-150 pickup trucks after investigating complaints about reduced power in EcoBoost engines.
